sentences.cn: 岁月并未使她的容颜减色.

sentences.en: And when these wither, fresh ones will arrive, right?
sentences.cn: 它们枯萎之后, 会有新的送来, 对 吗 ?

sentences.en: As the leaves of autumn wither and fall, so has my own life become barren.
sentences.cn: 我的生命就如秋叶般枯萎凋零。

sentences.en: Autumn wind rises; white clouds fly. Grass and trees wither; geese go south.
sentences.cn: 秋风起 兮 白云飞, 草木黄落 兮 雁南归.

sentences.en: He is just letting it wither there.
sentences.cn: 他只是让它在那自生自灭.

sentences.en: His roots up below and his branches wither above.
sentences.cn: 下边,他的根本要枯干.上边,他的枝子要剪除.

sentences.en: In autumn the leaves wither and fall off the trees.
sentences.cn: 秋天,树叶枯萎并从树上落下来.

sentences.en: Industries unable to modernize have been left to wither.
sentences.cn: 无法实现现代化的行业已经自行衰落。

sentences.en: Mother always buys many things at the January wither sale to save money.
sentences.cn: 为了节省钱,母亲总是在元月份家用织物减价大销售时购买了许多东西.

sentences.en: Remove an old tree and it will wither to death.
sentences.cn: [谚]老树移栽活不了,老人迁居命不长.

sentences.en: See how they hang their heads and droop, and wither.
sentences.cn: 看!它们不是低着头,弯下腰, 就要枯萎了吗?

sentences.en: She would wither and flicker out like a candle.
sentences.cn: 她会象烛光似的越来越黯淡和微弱.

sentences.en: The flowers in Isabel's room had withered.
sentences.cn: 伊莎贝尔房间里的花朵已经枯萎了。

sentences.en: The scorching torrent was enough to wither the face of the corpse.
sentences.cn: 这一阵激流似的痛骂,大可以使死人面上失色.

sentences.en: They don't wither of their own accord.
To see my body literally wither away before my eyes was exasperating.
sentences.cn: 眼见自己的身体日渐衰弱真是让人心烦。

words.tran_cn: 枯萎的；憔悴的；雕谢了的；尽是皱纹的
使干枯的；使畏缩的；极有毁灭性的；极有讽刺性的
干枯；减弱；羞愧（wither的过去分词）
使凋谢；干枯；减弱；摧毁（wither的现在分词）

phrases.tran_cn: （因疏忽、无行动而）未贯彻；未处理

trans.tran_en: if plants wither, they become drier and smaller and start to die

trans.tran_cn: 使枯萎,使凋谢；使人感觉羞愧或迷惑 "
trans.tran_en: if plants wither, they become drier and smaller and start to die
